channel.title: software development on Thuc notes
channel.description: Recent content in software development on Thuc notes

item.title: Gzip
item.description: GZIP is a lossless compression and decompression method. it supports the compression and decompression of a data stream to produce another data stream. It is based on Deflate that combines of LZ77 and Huffman coding

item.title: Deflate algorithm
item.description: Deflate is a lossless streaming compression/decompression algorithm. It’s used widely in GZIP and PNG. Deflate is a combination of LZ77 and Huffman coding algorithm to compress data.

item.title: Huffman coding algorithm
item.description: The Huffman coding is an algorithm that is used for lossless data compression, such as gzip or PNG image format.

item.title: Jump table (branch table)
item.description: The jump table is a method to transfer program control to another code block using a table of branch or jump instructions.

item.title: Retry strategies and patterns
item.description: Provide common retry strategies and patterns such as fibonacci, exponential, linear, polynomial
